profileAlternative.summary: DBA ORACLE and SQL Server. Managed Information system in the health wellness and fitness industry. Skilled in Performance Tuning, Oracle and Sql Servers Database, PL/SQL, SSIS, TFS, Quiz, HTML Scripting. Strong professional graduated from Ort Braude College as software engineer.

positions.title: DBA Oracle and SQL Server
positions.description:
Programming and maintaining structured processes, triggers, functions, Stored Procedure, indexes, views, etc. with PL / SQL.
• Tuning and Performance for continuous improvement of system code Oracle ans SQL Server.
• Working with TSF
• Working with rdl's ans SSL.
• Accompanying the process of assimilating new systems according to the company's requirements.
* Creating optimize queries to get maximum perfotmance.

positions.title: Chief Information in Sunrider Israel
positions.description:
I was responsible for:
1. Company's information systems in Israel, Turkey and Russia.
2. Characterization and design of the system.
3. Continuous improvement of the screens and reports in the existing systems.
4. Providing a solution to technological problems.
4. Development scripts in unix and pl/sql in order to improve exising automated processes.
5. Development of automated processes to replace manual processes.
6. Management IT staff.
7. Working with method Scrum/Agile.
8. Development of processes in the language of PL/SQL.
9. Development in cognos language .
10. Generating reports in excel from Unix using PL/SQL and HTML.
…
